當某些國際航空公司跪低改網頁的時候，CX仍然我行我素，抵我多年來對CX不離不棄，希望CX管理層繼續做好個牌子，成為香港人引以自豪的航空公司



China's aviation regulator in April gave dozens of airlines a deadline of May 25 to remove references on their websites and in other material that suggest Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau are countries independent of China. It subsequently extended the deadline to late June.......Several airlines have already tweaked their websites to comply with China's request. They include Air Canada, Air France, Germany's Lufthansa, British Airways and Emirates......

Source:
https://www.straitstimes.com/asia/east-asia/taiwan-fights-back-against-china-pressure
